## Who am I?

My name is Karsten Maurer. I live in the Twin Cities and I am a Senior Data Scientist at General Mills. I completed my doctoral degree in statistics at Iowa State University. I spent five years as a Professor of Statistics at Miami University before my current role; researching topics in predictive modeling, data visualization and statistics education.  

## Areas of Professional Strength?

* Statistical Programming
* Data Visualization
* Machine Learning
* Analytical Insights
